dict.acceptation: 晚的，迟到的；末期的，最近的；已故的；原来的，之前的；

sent.orig: She won't consent to him staying out late/to his staying out late.
sent.trans: 她不允许他呆在外面太晚。

sent.orig: Usually sown in late March or early april and harvested in late august or early September.
sent.trans: 通常在3月末、4月初播种，8月末、9月初收获。

sent.orig: More payments are late. Charges for late payments are a growing source of profit for banks.
sent.trans: 越来越多的还款都逾期了，逾期还款的费用也成为了银行收益不断的来源。

sent.orig: The manager raked me over the coals for being late for being late again.
sent.trans: 经理因我再次迟到而批评了我。

sent.orig: Your need to sleep late does not excuse your late arrival at work.
sent.trans: 你必须晚睡不能成为你上班迟到的理由。
